item.description:
Wednesday, February 17, 2010
6:30 pm – 8:00 pm
FREE SEMINAR ON BUILDING WEALTH THROUGH REAL ESTATE!
Derry Public Library
64 E. Broadway Derry NH
(Public Parking next to Masonic Hall)
Call 603-505-8683 for more information


You'll get an overview of the following topics:
• Choose Your Target Properties
• Build Your Buyer Lists
• Get the Deal to Come to You
• Collect the Info on the first phone call, & learn to Solve their Problem
• Analyze The Deal
o Quick numbers
o The first meeting / showing
o Validating the numbers, What does Due Diligence mean to YOU
• Work with Contractors
o Scope of Work
o Getting Estimates
o Partnering with Your Contractor
• Market the Deal
o Wholesale Package
o Open House
o Online selling
• Work with Investor-Buyers
• Get Paid
o Assigning Contract vs. Simultaneous Closing vs. Non-Simultaneous Closing
• Get Systemized
o Collecting Info
o Answering Calls
o Buyer Agents
o Contractors
o How to FREE UP YOUR TIME!
• And, much, much more!

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth

item.name: Investing in Real Estate with Local Investor Nick Aalerud!
